sentences.english: ObjectiveTo study the effect of Tongluo recipe on leptin and insulin in rat model of type 1 diabetes mellitus.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨通络方剂对1型糖尿病大鼠糖脂代谢的影响。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effects of glucose and lipid metabolism on gallstone formation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨糖脂代谢在胆囊结石形成中的作用。

sentences.english: Objective: To observe the therapeutic effect of Tangzhi decoction on type 2 diabetes mellitus (DM2) complicated with hyperlipidemia.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解糖脂饮治疗2型糖尿病伴高脂血症临床疗效。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, neutral glycosphingolipids also showed some obvious alteration.
sentences.chinese: 中性鞘糖脂也有明显变化。

sentences.english: The most widely used microbially produced biosurfactants are glycolipids.
sentences.chinese: 糖脂是应用最广泛的微生物表面活性剂。

sentences.english: The surface-active components of the culture broth were mainly glycolipids and monoglyceride.
sentences.chinese: 发酵液中表面活性物质主要是糖脂化合物及甘油单脂。

sentences.english: In some plants, glycolipid constitute the major polar lipids in ceil membranes.
sentences.chinese: 在有些植物中糖脂是细胞膜中主要的极性油脂。

sentences.english: The use of a microbially produced glycolipid emulsifier has proven helpful.
sentences.chinese: 微生物产生的糖脂乳化剂非常有效。

definition: polysaccharide (complex carbohydrate such as starch 澱粉|淀粉 and cellulose 纖維素|纤维素)
choline (amine related to vitamin B complex)
